title: Intrusive Memory
description: What happens to a horrifically abused child who is thrown into a brutal mental hospital at the age of 13, finds himself living life on the wrong side of the law as a blooming adolescent, and who subsequently is institutionalized in a sadistic military school? You'll be surprised!Dr. Leonardo Noto (nom de plume)Practicing Physician, Author, and Owner of "The Health and Medical Blog with a Personality."
author: Leonardo Antony Noto
